author: wwinokur
title: First Stay at The Surrey
text: My wife and I stayed at the Surrey for the first time this past week. I can't say enough about the hotel and the staff. The room (a Deluxe Salon) was cozy, had lots of natural light, had amazing water pressure in the shower and the bed was incredibly comfortable. The location is tough to beat if you want to be in the most elegant residential neighborhood of Manhattan steps off the park. The best part was actually the staff. From the moment we arrived until our departure, we were treated like homeowners returning to our Manhattan apartment - they went above and beyond the call of duty to make our stay great.
